name: Ice Is Nice
description:
Being ice is hard work. Physics work against you and you slide around like you're going downhill when you're not even on a hill...

Become the master of ice in Ice Is Nice, a platforming ice cube sim. Run through the game as fast as you can to collect stars by getting a low time! Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2020.

The music was found on OpenGameArt.org under the CC License.

https://opengameart.org/content/in-summer-nes-version

https://opengameart.org/content/aeitias-nes-mmc5-chiptune-dump
